name: QuestionTagStats
description: Statistics for question tags per user session

main_category.description: Main category (TWK, TIU, TKP, Non Tag)

total_questions.description: Total questions for this category in the session

correct_answers.description: Number of correct answers for this category

wrong_answers.description: Number of wrong answers for this category

unanswered.description: Number of unanswered questions for this category

total_time_seconds.description: Total time spent on questions of this category

average_time_seconds.description: Average time per question for this category
